arts.ttl: Post Match Reaction: Dortmund Record First Away Win to Close Out 2024
arts.sum: This is what happens when Beier is pushed into his natural position; he’s unleashed and he looks like the 30-million player BVB paid for. If you’ve read some of my other match reactions, you’ll probably know that I’m not the biggest fan of Serhou Guirassy.

arts.ttl: Tottenham transfer news: Borussia Dortmund ace with 'dual benefit' eyed for January deal
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur are reportedly keeping tabs on Borussia Dortmund's Julian Brandt, whom they have identified as a possible cut-price alternative to Eberechi Eze.

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund secure crucial away win against resilient Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund scored three quick goals in a clinical first half performance, weathering a Wolfsburg comeback attempt and a red card to claim a vital victory at the Volkswagen Arena. Players from both VfL Wolfsburg and Borussia Dortmund observe a minute's silence before kick-off, paying respect to the victims of the Magdeburg attack - IMAGO/Marco Steinbrenner/DeFodi Images

arts.ttl: Dortmund score three in five minutes to secure first away win
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund score three goals in five minutes to cap 2024 with their first Bundesliga away win of the season in a convincing victory against Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: Borussia Dortmund Beat Wolfsburg 3-1 to Finish 2024
arts.sum: First-half goals from Donyell Malen, Maximilian Beier, and Julian Brandt gave BVB a comfortable lead going into the break. They made hard work of it in the second half, but BVB finally picked up an away win in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Dortmund holds on with 10 men for 1st away win in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Donyell Malen got the visitors off the mark with a volley to a corner in the 25th, three minutes before Julian Brandt played in Maximilian Beier to score Dortmund’s second goal. Wolfsburg improved drastically after the break, when coach Ralph Hasenhüttl made two changes, including sending on Lukas Nmecha to face his brother Felix Nmecha, who was playing for Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Five minute flurry sees 10-man Dortmund past Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Bundesliga Matchday 15 came to an end with Wolfsburg playing host to Borussia Dortmund. The final fixture before the winter break ended in a 3-1 victory for Die Schwarzgelben.

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Dortmund Close out the Hinrunde Against Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Streaming: ESPN+ (US), Sky GO Extra (UK)

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Wolfsburg vs. Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Wolfsburg vs. Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs Borussia Dortmund preview: BVB look to end winless run
arts.sum: Wolfsburg will aim to get their push for European qualification back on track as they face a Borussia Dortmund side aiming to end their winless run at Volkswagen Arena on Sunday.
